item.name: Article Comments Audit for article group
Create publication group with publication for reading level 1
Add publication for reading level 3 + send publication for reading level 1 to publisher
From reading level 3 publication, remove 1 article and add another
Publisher sends back reading level 1 publication for rework
Editor marks reading level 1 publication as ready for publish
Publisher publishes publication for reading level 1
